General.Name: Appreciate Holdings Inc
General.Description: Appreciate Holdings, Inc., a single-family rental (SFR) services company, operates an end-to-end technology platform serving individual and institutional investors in the United States. The company operates through two segments, Management and Marketplace. The Management segment provides services related to the leasing and managing of SFR properties. The Marketplace segment offers real property sourcing and acquisition services, as well as renovation services, including construction management services. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Minnetonka, Minnesota.
General.Address: 6101 Baker Road, Minnetonka, MN, United States, 55345
